meanings.definition: To infect (a person, animal, or plant) with a second or subsequent infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor warned that if the wound is not properly treated, it may superinfect.
meanings.sent2: It is important to keep the wound clean to prevent it from superinfecting.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria decided to throw a party on the wound and superinfect it.
meanings.sent4: The virus seemed to dance around the cells, ready to superinfect them.
meanings.sent5: The idea of germs multiplying to superinfect the body is quite alarming.

meanings.definition: An infection that occurs on top of an existing infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with a superinfect, complicating the treatment.
meanings.sent2: The superinfect made the patient's recovery more challenging.
meanings.sent3: The superinfect seemed to be playing hide and seek with the original infection.
meanings.sent4: The superinfect was like an unwelcome guest crashing the body's immune response party.
meanings.sent5: The presence of a superinfect can make fighting off illnesses even harder.
